commit message:
- clarified License
- enhanced system command
- improved log system
- some code cleanup in BackupAGent

Added the UserCommand class for parsing commands and isolating away the Xmpp protocol awareness somewhat from the commands. In an initial step, the impact is very low. Also added a Settings class for remotely changing the settings of the application. Currently supports only getting setting property values.

last recipient is now saved also on permanent storage
added Hugo to Authors

added 5 xmpp connectin state 'waiting for network'
refactoring

rename : src/com/googlecode/gtalksms/cmd/UserCommand.java => src/com/googlecode/gtalksms/cmd/Command.java
rename : src/com/googlecode/gtalksms/cmd/Command.java => src/com/googlecode/gtalksms/cmd/CommandHandlerBase.java

added missing MUCPacketListener for the rejoined rooms
some code refactoring

rename : src/com/googlecode/gtalksms/cmd/SettingsCommand.java => src/com/googlecode/gtalksms/cmd/SettingsCmd.java
finishing touches on MUC with > 2 occupants

renamed MUCHelper
some more muc rejoin stuff

--HG--
rename : src/com/googlecode/gtalksms/databases/MucHelper.java => src/com/googlecode/gtalksms/databases/MUCHelper.java
New option: start connecting when gtalksms is started (=when mainscreen is shown)
added ant build.xml (needs some fixing, does not work atm)

- FileCmd with key-value database support
- set keepAlive interval to 15 min to save energy
- improved exception handling in xmppMuc

Adding missing translations
Suppress deprecated warn
Add write file method in Tools
Add new camera command. That takes a picture without confirmation and open picture transfer selector (for the first version)

updated asmack https://github.com/Flowdalic/smack/commits/master
added missing cursor close in DBs
added offline message support (needs more testing!)
Take pictures and send them via xmpp

set minSdk to 5 again
enhaced camera command + bug fixes
groundwork for DB backed SMS map
